page.title: 01SUMMARY OF GRANGE/BUTETOWN
page.content:
{Summary of the Grange/Butetown area.
The area is an inner city suburb of Cardiff. It is one of the older suburbs which has undergone some redevelopment, both in the residential and commercial areas. There is a mixture of ethnic groups in the area.
It is said that the close-knit nature of the community is due to the fact that one has to cross a bridge or railway track to enter or leave the area.
The game of Baseball is played only in Cardiff, Newport and Liverpool; and Grangetown is said to be its home.
